LanguageData.Weapon_GravityGrenades.label: Gravity grenades
LanguageData.Weapon_GravityGrenades.description: Creates a gravitational funnel in the center of the explosion, attracting living things and then exploding.
LanguageData.Weapon_GravityGrenades.verbs.0.label: throw gravity grenade
LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeGravity.label: frag grenade
